text: Walter Bottega (born 24 May 1972) is an Italian rower. He competed at the 1992 Summer Olympics and the 1996 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1972 births Category:Living people Category:Italian male rowers Category:Olympic rowers of Italy Category:Rowers at the 1992 Summer Olympics Category:Rowers at the 1996 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Turin
title: Walter Bottega
